title: Sebastian Coe - Wikipedia
snippet: Sebastian Newbold Coe, Baron Coe, CH, KBE, Hon FRIBA (born 29 September 1956), often referred to as Seb Coe, is a British sports administrator, former politician and retired track and field athlete. As a middle-distance runner, Coe won four Olympic medals, including 1500 metres gold medals at the Olympic Games in 1980 and 1984.

title: Seb Coe and his glamourous fiancée - who would have been wife number 3 - 'separate nine months after announcing engagement' | Daily Mail Online
snippet: He then married journalist Carole Annett in 2011 after an eight-year romance. Ms Annett's first husband, Andy, branded Coe a 'marriage wrecker' in 2004 for allegedly romancing his wife of 15 years before they had split.

title: Back on track after break-up, Seb Coe and his glamorous Los Angeles fiancee - as 68-year-old Olympian is set to wed for the third time | Daily Mail Online
snippet: The 68-year-old Olympian has 'quietly reunited' with glamorous Los Angeles PR woman Sarah Robarts and the pair are 'happier than ever' and planning their future.

title: Wedding Of Sebastian Coe To His Long Time Girlfriend
snippet: Lord Sebastian Coe or mainly known by his nick name Seb Coe and head of working group that organize 2012 London Olympics has wed his long time girlfriend Carole Annett into a quiet ceremonial in Surrey England on Saturday.

title: Sebastian Coe finds love with Los Angeles PR boss | Daily Mail Online
snippet: The double Olympic gold winner Lord Coe, 65, is clearly back on track with his love life as he shows off his new girlfriend, Los Angeles PR boss Sarah Robarts · Former flames: It is not known whether Ms Robarts has been married before but she ...
